title: Odion Ighalo - Wikipedia
snippet: On 4 February 2021, Ighalo joined Saudi Professional League club Al Shabab on a two-and-a-half-year contract. On 29 January 2022, he signed for Saudi club Al-Hilal. He finished his first season as the league's top scorer with 24 goals.

title: Odion Ighalo | Football Stats | Al-Hilal | Age 36 | Soccer Base
snippet: Odion Ighalo. (Born 16 Jun, 1989) Forward for Al-Hilal. Current season & career stats available, including appearances, goals & transfer fees.

title: Odion Ighalo: Nigeria striker joins Al Hilal from Al Shabab - BBC Sport
snippet: Nigeria striker Odion Ighalo leaves Saudi Arabian side Al Shabab for city rivals Al Hilal on an 18-month deal.

title: Odion Ighalo - Nigeria | Player Profile | Sky Sports Football
snippet: Name: Odion Ighalo · Date of birth:16/06/1989 · Place of birth: Nigeria · Height: 1.88m · Club: Al-Hilal · Squad: 9 · Position: Striker · Odion Ighalo's loan move to Man Utd from Shanghai Shenhua in January 2020 is still considered one of the unlikeliest transfers of recent windows.
